MoneyDolly - Fundraising Made Easy

MoneyDolly is a mobile-friendly fundraising platform that streamlines and enhances fundraising efforts for organizations like schools, sports teams, and community groups. It provides diverse fundraising options, including accepting donations, selling products, hosting events, or combining these approaches.

Users can set fundraising goals, personalize campaign pages with team photos and messages, and invite participants to join through the app. Supporters can contribute via calls, texts, or emails, with products shipped directly to them, removing the need for in-person deliveries.

Flutter Android (Kotlin) iOS (Swift) CI/CD (CodeMagic) Spring Framework Docker Firebase

Dafoxtech - Your Digital Transaction Partner

DafoxTech app is a versatile platform designed to simplify and streamline the management of a wide range of digital services. Whether you're looking to handle prepaid loads, top-ups, in-game credits, monthly bill payments, or general transactions, DafoxTech offers an efficient and user-friendly solution to meet your needs.

Flutter Android (Kotlin) iOS (Swift) CI/CD (CodeMagic)

Mobii - Peer to Peer Car Rental Platform

Mobii is your ultimate car rental partner, right at your fingertips. With seamless peer-to-peer platform, renting a car has never been simpler. Explore a vast selection of unique and exciting car listings tailored to your rental needs, anytime and anywhere.

Flutter Android (Kotlin) iOS (Swift) CI/CD (Github Actions) NodeJS Docker Docupass Firebase

Jetpay

A novel peer-to-peer application that allows individuals without bank accounts or credit cards to locate mobile point-of-sales, in order to pay for goods & services and find mobile tellers, in order to fund wallets or get cash. The mobile tellers can earn money using the app to conduct business on-the-go e.g. eloading, bills payments, non-life insurance applications, etc. This innovative platform-as-a-service available to the MLM and coop industries is expected to especially benefit members, direct sellers and networkers.

Flutter Android (Java) PHP Google Cloud Firebase

FindJustice PH - Justice on your fingertips!

FindJusticePH is a free geographic information system (GIS) designed with partner agencies including the Supreme Court, the Office of the Court Administrator, the Management Information Systems office, Public Attorney’s Office and the Legal Education Board.

The app aims to store, manage and display geographical data to connect users and the legal services around the country.

Android (Java/Kotlin) iOS (Objective-C) CI/CD (CodeMagic) PHP Google Cloud Firebase

SMS Sender

An Android SMS application to manage incoming SMS data from the proprietary client app. The application serves as an alternative gateway for transmitting or updating user data when an internet connection is unavailable.

Link to github repo

Flutter Android (Java/Kotlin) CI/CD (CodeMagic) PHP Firebase
